meanings.definition: A person who supervises the brewing of beer.
meanings.sent1: The brewmasters at the brewery ensure the beer is made correctly.
meanings.sent2: The brewmasters are skilled in crafting different types of beer.
meanings.sent3: The brewmasters decided to have a beer tasting contest to see who could brew the best.
meanings.sent4: The brewmasters are like conductors, orchestrating the perfect blend of ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The brewmasters' expertise shines through in every batch they create.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals responsible for creating and overseeing the production of beer.
meanings.sent1: The brewmasters work together to ensure the brewery runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The brewmasters meet weekly to discuss new beer recipes.
meanings.sent3: The brewmasters decided to have a team-building retreat at a beer festival.
meanings.sent4: The brewmasters are the heart and soul of the brewery, driving its success.
meanings.sent5: The brewmasters' dedication to their craft is evident in every bottle of beer.
